TEXT.TITLE: NORTHERN TELECOM LTD <NT> DECLARES STOCK SPLIT
TEXT.BODY: Two-for-one stock split Pay May 12 Note: split is subject to approval of shareholders at April 23 annual meeting. Company also said it will increase dividend on post-split shares to six cts from five cts. Reuter
